alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hendry and eastern Glades Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeport, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Buckhead Ridge, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Indian Prairie Canal Mouth, Harlem and Lake Hicpochee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
